required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Vacuum Myofascial Therapy Device in Treatment of Muscle Fibrosis
clinical_study.official_title: Vacuum Myofascial Therapy Device in Treatment of Muscle Fibrosis

brief_summary.textblock: We present the case of a 24-year-old professional soccer player, with no personal history of interest, who came to the X-Ray diagnosis service due to severe pain in the right quadriceps muscle after a 10-month evolution of muscle rupture occurred during sports practice.

detailed_description.textblock:
PHYSIUM System® provides standardized negative pressure massage for 15 minutes with the analgesic program and 15 minutes with the trigger points program at 80 millibars with eight adjustable arms, both in the entire muscle and in muscle fibrosis.
Seven days later, after PHYSIUM System® session with the same parameters of the previous treatment, ultrasound elastography was performed.

primary_outcome.measure: The intensity of pain in muscle fibrosis
primary_outcome.description: A 10-point Numerical Pain Rating Scale (NPRS; 0: no pain, 10: maximum pain) will be used to assess the patients' current level of elbow pain, and the worst and lowest level of pain experienced in the preceding week.

secondary_outcome.measure: The intensity of pain in muscle fibrosis
secondary_outcome.description: A 10-point Numerical Pain Rating Scale (NPRS; 0: no pain, 10: maximum pain) will be used to assess the patients' current level of elbow pain, and the worst and lowest level of pain experienced in the preceding week.

arm_group.description: PHYSIUM System® provides standardized negative pressure massage for 15 minutes with the analgesic program and 15 minutes with the trigger points program at 80 millibars with eight adjustable arms both in the entire muscle and in muscle fibrosis.

intervention.description: PHYSIUM System® provides standardized negative pressure massage for 15 minutes with the analgesic program and 15 minutes with the trigger points program at 80 millibars with eight adjustable arms both in the entire muscle and in muscle fibrosis.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria.
- 24-year-old professional soccer player.
- No personal medical history of interest

responsible_party.investigator_title: Treatment of muscle fibrosis with physical therapy.
